title: trinket sound effects
body:
I recently bought a skin ward and with the recent changes, i cant even buy a ward! I am left with this poor trinket sound wich annoys me even more than anything, i dont want to play support only to hear my sweeeeet bell sound. Please can you make the trinket sound effect and sightstone wards the same? I worked hard for this money i gave you, please 

thank you for your time

replies.body:
Hey Doc SHRYZEN,

Trinkets are currently set to use a base SFX are gameplay reasons. Custom SFX are currently set to play on Sightstone wards and pink wards.

Have you thought about keeping both SFX for Trinket Wards, just like Sightstone Wards?
As in, I hear a ding and I know it's a trinket, but I also get to listen to a cute Poro :3 

Though maybe the Trinket Wards' SFX is too long and loud for it to work? :(
It wouldn't be clear with the overlapping sounds, and for some, would likely sound pretty bad. :c
